description: Analyze and visualize your data in seconds. Vizly is an AI-powered data scientist that lets you chat with your data, visualize insights, and perform analysis.
title: Vizly: AI-powered data analysis
keywords: ai data analysis, data science, data visualization, data analysis, excel ai, google sheets ai
introduction: Vizly is an AI-powered data scientist that allows users to chat with their data, visualize insights, and perform analysis by simply uploading their data.

faqs.question: Is Vizly free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes! All users can send up to 10 messages a month for free. After reaching the limit, you can upgrade your plan on your Profile page.

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Sign up to Vizly and immediately start asking questions and creating visualizations from your data. For more instructions on how to get started, check out our Getting Started guide.

faqs.question: What data sources are supported?
faqs.answer: Vizly currently supports CSV, Excel, and JSON file formats, with more on the way. Want to use Vizly with another datasource? Request it here.

faqs.question: Does Vizly have a student discount?
faqs.answer: Yes! Vizly offers a 50% discount to all students and academics. Sign up with your academic email to have the discount automatically applied or send an email to founders@vizlylabs.com for a discount code.
